Class Menu

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
Controller.Main
Menus.Menu
public class Menu extends Main
This class represents the main menu of the application, handling UI setup, button actions, and scene management for the game's main menu. It is implemented as a singleton to ensure only one instance of the ending menu is active at a time. This class dynamically updates its root group to manage UI transitions effectively. Source Code: GitHub Link The type Menu.
